Name: Night Vigil
About the game: My Insomnia Presents: NIGHT VIGIL After a biological attack turns most of the people in Chicago to monsters it's up to you and your team of Extraordinaries to save the night! Tactical, turn-based role playing game; More than 30 replayable missions; Build a team of six superheros; Dozens of super powers and items.
